title: Xaqiijinta Akoonta
subtitle: Dhamaystir xaqiijinta si aad u hubiso ammaanka martida iyo kalsoonida

email.title: Xaqiijinta Email-ka
email.subtitle: Xaqiiji cinwaanka email-kaaga si xidhiidh ammaan ah loo yeesho
email.codeExpired: Koodku waa dhammaaday. Fadlan mid cusub codso.
email.invalidCode: Kood khaldan. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
email.verificationSuccess: Email-ka si guul leh ayaa loo xaqiijiyay!
email.helpText: Waxaan kuu diri doonaa kood xaqiijin cinwaanka email-kaaga. Tani waxay caawisaa in xidhiidh ammaan ah la yeesho martida.

phone.title: Xaqiijinta Telefoonka
phone.subtitle: Xaqiiji lambarka telefoonkaaga xidhiidhyada degdegga ah
phone.codeExpired: Koodka SMS waa dhammaaday. Fadlan mid cusub codso.
phone.invalidCode: Koodka SMS khaldan. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
phone.verificationSuccess: Telefoonka si guul leh ayaa loo xaqiijiyay!
phone.helpText: Waxaan kuu diri doonaa SMS oo ay ku jirto kood xaqiijin. Tani waxay awood u siisaa xidhiidh degdeg ah martida haddii loo baahdo.

identity.title: Xaqiijinta Aqoonsiga
identity.subtitle: Xaqiiji aqoonsigaaga ammaanka martida iyo kalsoonida
identity.verificationSuccess: Aqoonsiga si guul leh ayaa loo xaqiijiyay!
identity.helpText: Xaqiijinta aqoonsigu wuxuu caawiyaa in kalsoni la dhiso martida una hubiso ammaanka goobta. Habkani waa mid ammaan ah oo qarsoodi ah.
identity.documentUploaded: Dukumentiga si guul leh ayaa loo soo geliyay
identity.documentError: Soo gelinta dukumentiga ayaa fashilantay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
identity.privacyNote: Dukumeentiyada aqoonsigaaga waa la qariyay oo si ammaan ah ayaa loo kaydiyay. Waxaan u isticmaalnaa oo kaliya ujeedooyin xaqiijin.

progress.title: Horumarka Xaqiijinta
progress.description: Dhamaystir dhammaan xaqiijinada si aad u socoto
